Utilities

Learn how to build your website with boba!

Background

A collection of classes to make styling your elements a breeze.

Colors

Easily add a background color to any of your elements.
Colors
To change background color add a .bg-{COLOR} class. Colors are from boba's palette.
.bg-red Add the .bg-red class to make the background of an element red Hello World, I have a red background!
.bg-orange Add the .bg-orange class to make the background of an element orange Hello World, I have an orange background!
.bg-yellow Add the .bg-yellow class to make the background of an element yellow Hello World, I have a yellow background!
.bg-green Add the .bg-green class to make the background of an element green Hello World, I have a green background!
.bg-teal Add the .bg-teal class to make the background of an element teal Hello World, I have a teal background!
.bg-blue Add the .bg-blue class to make the background of an element blue Hello World, I have a blue background!
.bg-indigo Add the .bg-indigo class to make the background of an element indigo Hello World, I have an indigo background!
.bg-purple Add the .bg-purple class to make the background of an element purple Hello World, I have a purple background!
.bg-pink Add the .bg-pink class to make the background of an element pink Hello World, I have a pink background!
.bg-dark Add the .bg-dark class to make the background of an element dark Hello World, I have a dark background!
.bg-light Add the .bg-light class to make the background of an element light Hello World, I have a light background!
.bg-black Add the .bg-black class to make the background of an element black Hello World, I have a black background!
.bg-white Add the .bg-white class to make the background of an element white Hello World, I have a white background!

Extended

Additional utilities to help you fine-tune boba to your needs

Hover

Lorum Ipsem
Background Hover
To change the background color on hover, add a .bg-hover-{COLOR} class. Colors are from boba's palette.
.bg-hover-red Add a .bg-hover-red with to make the background red on hover Hello World, I'm red on hover!
.bg-hover-orange Add a .bg-hover-orange with to make the background orange on hover Hello World, I'm orange on hover!
.bg-hover-yellow Add a .bg-hover-yellow with to make the background yellow on hover Hello World, I'm yellow on hover!
.bg-hover-green Add a .bg-hover-green with to make the background green on hover Hello World, I'm green on hover!
.bg-hover-teal Add a .bg-hover-teal with to make the background teal on hover Hello World, I'm teal on hover!
.bg-hover-blue Add a .bg-hover-blue with to make the background blue on hover Hello World, I'm blue on hover!
.bg-hover-indigo Add a .bg-hover-indigo with to make the background indigo on hover Hello World, I'm indigo on hover!
.bg-hover-purple Add a .bg-hover-purple with to make the background purple on hover Hello World, I'm purple on hover!
.bg-hover-pink Add a .bg-hover-pink with to make the background pink on hover Hello World, I'm pink on hover!
.bg-hover-dark Add a .bg-hover-dark with to make the background dark on hover Hello World, I'm dark on hover!
.bg-hover-light Add a .bg-hover-light with to make the background light on hover Hello World, I'm light on hover!
.bg-hover-black Add a .bg-hover-black with to make the background black on hover Hello World, I'm black on hover!
.bg-hover-white Add a .bg-hover-white with to make the background white on hover Hello World, I'm white on hover!
